LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertSimple.label: cook simple dessert
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertSimple.description: Cook a simple dessert quickly made from a few fruits and other ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertSimpleBulk.label: cook simple dessert x4
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertSimpleBulk.description: Cook 4 simple desserts quickly made from a few fruits and other ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertFine.label: cook fine dessert
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertFine.description: Cook a complex dessert assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.\n\nNote that because Chocolate has 0.10 nutrition per unit, some of it will be wasted while cooking this recipe. Consider using the bulk (x4) version of this recipe instead to avoid wastage.
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertFineBulk.label: cook fine dessert x4
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertFineBulk.description: Cook 4 complex desserts assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertLavish.label: cook lavish dessert
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertLavish.description: Cook a masterpiece of the culinary arts, this dessert nourishes the body, mind, and soul.\n\nNote that because Chocolate has 0.10 nutrition per unit, some of it will be wasted while cooking this recipe. Consider using the bulk (x4) version of this recipe instead to avoid wastage.
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertLavishBulk.label: cook lavish dessert x4
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertLavishBulk.description: Cook 4 masterpieces of the culinary arts, this dessert nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertGourmet.label: cook gourmet dessert
LanguageData.VCE_CookDessertGourmet.description: Cook a culinary work of art, characterized by refined, even elaborate preparation and presentation of an aesthetically balanced, albeit low quantity dessert.
